function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to global travel and trade","Impact":"Collapse of city economies, quarantine measures, restrictions on travel and trade","Mitigation":"Stringent health screening, travel restrictions, quarantine protocols, and international cooperation","Technologies":"Health screening equipment, quarantine facilities, real-time disease tracking systems","People":"Citizens, travelers, and global trade partners","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities, and international trade organizations"}]}
